00417 inline int
00418 SearchMapItem::getBestNameNbr(const SearchMap2* theMap,
00419                               LangTypes::language_t lang) const
00420 {
00421    // FIXME: Implement functions in SearchMap2 and SearchMapStringTable
00422    //        to avoid going via the string.
00423    const char* bestName = getBestName(theMap, lang).first;
00424    const int nbrNames = getNbrNames(theMap);
00425    for(int i=0; i < nbrNames; ++i ) {
00426       if ( strcmp(getName(theMap, i), bestName) == 0 ) {
00427          return i;
00428       }
00429    }
00430    // Should be impossible.
00431    return 0;
00432 }

00471 inline bool
00472 SearchMapItem::sameNames(const SearchMap2* theMap,
00473                          const SearchMapItem* otherItem) const
00474 {
00475    // Since every combination of names should be in the table once
00476    // this comparison should do it.
00477    return m_strIdx == otherItem->m_strIdx;
00478 }
00479 
00480 inline bool
00481 SearchMapItem::oneNameSame(const SearchMap2* theMap,
00482                            const SearchMapItem* other) const
00483 {
00484    const int nbrNamesInThis = getNbrNames(theMap);
00485    const int nbrNamesInOther = other->getNbrNames(theMap);
00486    for( int i=0; i < nbrNamesInThis; ++i ) {
00487       const uint32 iNameIdx = getNameIdx(theMap, i); 
00488       for( int j=0; j < nbrNamesInOther; ++j ) {
00489          if ( iNameIdx == other->getNameIdx(theMap, j) ) {
00490             return true;
00491          }
00492       }
00493    }
00494    return false;
00495 }
00496 
00497 inline bool
00498 SearchMapItem::oneNameSameCase(const SearchMap2* theMap,
00499                                const SearchMapItem* other) const
00500 {
00501    const int nbrNamesInThis = getNbrNames(theMap);
00502    const int nbrNamesInOther = other->getNbrNames(theMap);
00503    for( int i=0; i < nbrNamesInThis; ++i ) {
00504       const char* nameI = getName(theMap, i);
00505       for( int j=0; j < nbrNamesInOther; ++j ) {
00506          const char* nameJ = other->getName(theMap, j);
00507          // Return true if one of the strings is a substring of the
00508          // other.
00509          if ( StringUtility::strcasecmp( nameI, nameJ ) == 0){
00510             return true;
00511          }
00512       }
00513    }
00514    return false;
00515 }
00516 
00517 inline bool
00518 SearchMapItem::oneNameSimilar(const SearchMap2* theMap,
00519                               const SearchMapItem* other) const
00520 {
00521    const int nbrNamesInThis = getNbrNames(theMap);
00522    const int nbrNamesInOther = other->getNbrNames(theMap);
00523    for( int i=0; i < nbrNamesInThis; ++i ) {
00524       const char* nameI = getName(theMap, i);
00525       for( int j=0; j < nbrNamesInOther; ++j ) {
00526          const char* nameJ = other->getName(theMap, j);
00527          // Return true if one of the strings is a substring of the
00528          // other.
00529          if ( strstr(nameI, nameJ) || strstr(nameJ, nameI) ) {
00530             return true;
00531          }
00532       }
00533    }
00534    return false;
00535 }
00536 
00537 inline bool
00538 SearchMapItem::shouldBeFound(const SearchMap2* theMap) const
00539 {
00540    return theMap->itemShouldBeFound(getIndex(theMap));
00541 }
00542 
00543 inline uint32
00544 SearchMapItem::getRadiusMeters(const SearchMap2* theMap) const
00545 {
00546    const SearchMapRadiusInfo* radiusInfo =
00547       theMap->getRadiusInfo(this);
00548    if ( radiusInfo == NULL ) {
00549       return 0;
00550    } else {
00551       return radiusInfo->getRadiusMeters(theMap);
00552    }
00553       
00554 }
